2124.subject: BUS
2124.descrlong: Provides both the strategic and technical essentials of designing, developing, and managing an e-Commerce initiative.  Surveys the landscape of e-Commerce technologies and how businesses employ them to gain competitive advantages.  Covers technology and design issues while providing hands-on experience as students step through the process of designing and developing a functional prototype of an e-Commerce site.  Explores issues and practices of management related to maintaining the e-Commerce site. (Offered Fall semester.)
